name: Ideal 3 BDR to stay by the Red Line!
description:
3 Quiet rooms with living room, kitchen, pantry & bathroom in a quiet, diverse owner occupied residential area, with beautiful Victorian houses & a peaceful park for the neighborhood children and 2 elementary schools near by that uses the park occasionally. Its diversity translates into wonderful restaurants along "Dot" (Dorchester) Ave, food, market shops near by. The Red line train is 2-3 minutes walk from the house and it takes 15 minutes to downtown Boston, 20 to MGH, 30 to BID hospitals.

The space
Also, there are Coin-Operated Washer and Dryer on the 2nd floor that can be used on Saturdays "Only" thru scheduled morning appointments with the host.
Washer = 8 Quarters
Dryer = 4 Quarters

Guest access
Guests can access all areas within the unit.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
